summary.purpose: Barrel export file for the ModularForm sub-module, re-exporting the ModularForm component and all form element building blocks.
summary.problem_solved: Provides a single entry point for importing the ModularForm default component and all individual form element components (InputContainer, SelectContainer, etc.) from the formElements module.

exports.name: ModularForm
exports.description: Re-exports the ModularForm component as a named export (originally the default export of ModularForm.tsx).

Re-exports all named exports from formElements.tsx including InputContainer, SelectContainer, MultiSelect, TextAreaContainer, CheckboxContainer, FormSeparator, DateInputContainer, DurationPicker, SelectWithSearch, FormElementContainer, ElementLabel, ElementsContainer, InternationalPhonePicker, useSortValues, and CSS class name constants.
